Cintya is 29 years old. She is single, has no children, and is from the central zone of the region. She is hardworking and responsible, with a desire for self-improvement, and she fights to keep her business going and to establish it in this season of school supplies. 

Thanks to her desire to get ahead, she works selling plastic products such as bags of different sizes, buckets, and pitchers. She has been doing this for twenty years. 

Her business is located in the house where she lives. She is currently working to establish sales of school supplies and take advantage of the start of classes for children and university students. She works some twelve hours a day at her business selling her products. 

The objective of the loan is to invest in working capital and to stock her business, so that in the near future she may obtain better profits. Cintya is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer to people of scarce resources from poor countries like Nicaragua, so that they can have decent work.

loans.use: to buy and sell plastic items, such as plastic bags, plates, buckets, and disposable utensils

loans.name: G.s Valle De Bendicion Group

texts.es:
EL G.S. VALLE DE BENDICIÓN ESTA CONFORMADO POR  CINCO INTEGRANTES MADRES SOLTERAS  SEIS  HIJOS MENORES DE EDAD LOS CUALES ESTÁN ESTUDIANDO, SON ORIGINARIAS DE ACHUAPA LUGAR QUE ESTA UBICADO EN LA ZONA  DE OCCIDENTE DEL PAIS, SE CARACTERIZAN POR SER TRABAJADORAS, RESPONSABLES, CON GANAS DE SUPERACIÓN PERSONAL, LAMENTABLEMENTE POR FALTA DE RECURSOS ECONÓMICOS NO PUDIERON ESTUDIAR   Y SE VIERON OBLIGADAS  A TRABAJAR DESDE TEMPRANA EDAD PARA AYUDAR CON LOS GASTOS DEL HOGAR.
EN LA ACTUALIDAD LUCHAN PARA SALIR ADELANTE CON SUS NEGOCIOS, Y HACERLOS CRECER PARA TENER MEJORES INGRESOS, SILVIA ES LA COORDINADORA Y  TIENE POR ACTIVIDAD ECONÓMICA LA UNA PULPERIA ES UNA PEQUEÑA TIENDA QUE VENDE PRODUCTOS COMESTIBLE EN CANTIDADES PEQUEÑAS COMO: ARROZ, FRIJOLES, AZÚCAR, LECHE PAN, HUEVOS, JUGOS, GASEOSOS. ELLA DEDICA UNAS DOCE HORAS DIARIAS A SU NEGOCIO, PARA QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS, EL OBJETIVO DEL CREDITO ES INVERTIR EN CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y SURTIR SU NEGOCIO PARA QUE EN UN FUTURO NO MUY LEJANO PUEDA OBTENER MEJORES INGRESOS. G.S. VALLE DE CONDICIONEN AGRADECE LA AYUDA QUE LOS INVERSIONISTAS KIVA LE BRINDAN A PERSONAS DE ESCASOS RECURSOS Y PAÍSES POBRE COMO ES NICARAGUA PARA TENER UN MEDIO DE TRABAJO DIGNO.
texts.en:
The loan group "Valle de Bendición" consists of five members, single mothers with six minor children who are in school. They are originally from Achuapa, a place that is located in the western part of the country. They are known for being hard-working and responsible, with the will for personal achievement. Unfortunately, due to the lack of economic resources, they were not able to go to school and were obligated to work from an early age to help with the household expenses.

Now they are striving to get ahead with their businesses and make them grow in order to have better income. Silvia is the coordinator, and her business is a grocery store. It is a little store that sells food products in small quantities, such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, juices, and soft drinks. She dedicates some twelve hours a day to her business so that in the not-too-distant future she can obtain better income. The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business so that in the not-too-distant future she can obtain better income.

The loan group "Valle de Bendición" is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer to people of scarce resources and poor countries such as Nicaragua so that they can have a means of dignified work.

loans.use: to invest in food products for her grocery store, such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, eggs, juices, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Santos Adonay

texts.es: Santos vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, Santos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos
texts.en: Santos lives in his own house with his wife and his two children. He has been working for a number of years in agriculture growing corn and sorghum. He sells his harvest in the neighboring villages as he has many regular clients. Santos is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control, herbicide, etc. to improve the land shown in the photograph. Then he can continue with his growing as this is his only source of work and thereby obtaining higher income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest controls, herbicide, etc. to improve his land.

loans.name: Maritza Jaqueline

texts.es:
EL sitio Pueblo Nuevo de la ciudad de Portoviejo, cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Grupo De  Crédito Everest. Este es un lugar lleno de vegetación y paisajes hermosos, donde la gente en su mayoría se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, actividad con la cual salen adelante.
En este lugar vive la señora Maritza, tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco  hijos, tres mayores de edad y dos de 15 y 12 años  de edad, tres de ellos estudian dos  en colegio y otro en una universidad, 4 de ellos aun viven con ella. Su esposo es agricultor.
Doña Maritza es una muy buena esposa que le gusta trabajar para ayudarle a su marido a salir adelante, ella tiene una pequeña procesadora de maní, cocina el maní y lo muele y luego vende en su casa a clientes que ya saben de la calidad del producto, también prepara la deliciosa sal prieta que es algo típico de la provincia. Ella también la da parte del crédito a su marido  para que él lo utilice en la agricultura, él tiene cultivos de maíz y maní y cuenta con terrenos apropiados para sembrar más que todo en la época invernal.
Este crédito es para comprar  semillas, fertilizantes  y maní que es la materia prima para lo que ella prepara y vende. Lleva 2 ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque así ella se gana lo suyo. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
In the site of Pueblo Nuevo in the city of Portoviejo, every 15 days the members of the Grupo De Crédito Everest meet. This is a place full of vegetation and beautiful landscapes, where the majority of people make a living in agriculture and ranching, activity with which they get by. 

In this place lives señora Maritza, 41 years old, she is married and from this relationship she has five children, three adults and two who are 15 and 12 years old, three of them are in school, two in primary school and the other in university. 4 of them even live with her. Her husband is a farmer. 

Doña Maritza is a very good wife who likes to work to help her husband get by, she has a small peanut processor, she cooks the peanut and grinds it and later sells it in her house to clients who already know about the quality of the product, she also prepares delicious salprieta which is something typical from the province. She also gives part of her loan to her husband so he can use it in farming, he has corn and peanut crops and he counts on suitable land to grow, more than ever in the winter time.

This loan is to purchase seeds, fertilizers and peanut which is the raw material she can prepare and sell. She has been with Grup De Crêdito for 2 cycles and she likes it because in this way she earns her own way. Her dreams are to give the best to her family.

loans.use: comprar  semillas, fertilizantes  y maní.

loans.name: Victor Adonay

texts.es:
Adonay, de 38 años de edad, es jornalero, estudió hasta bachillerato, está acompañado y junto con su pareja tiene 3 hijos de 16, 10 y 2 años de edad, de los cuales uno le ayuda a trabajar, mientras que los otros dos se encuentran estudiando, su compañera de vida se dedica al cuido de sus hijos y a los quehaceres del hogar.

Adonay, se dedica a la ganadería, la agricultura y a la siembra de hortalizas desde hace 20 años, este trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres, ellos siempre se han dedicado a este oficio.- Para llegar a su trabajo Adonay, camina 4 kilómetros y trabaja de 6:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m. todos los días.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para comprar 2 vacas, las cuales le darán producción de leche y podrá venderla y obtener un poco más de ingresos, para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

Adonay, sueña con aumentar su hato ganadero y darle todo lo necesario a sus hijos, para que estudien y sean profesionales; así podrán tener mejores posibilidades de empleo y poder construir una vivienda de ladrillo, ya que en la que viven actualmente es de barro.
texts.en:
Adonay, 38 years old, is a day laborer. He studied as far as secondary school. He is married, and he and his partner have three children aged 16, 10, and 2. One of them helps him work, while the other two are in school. His wife takes care of the children and does the household tasks.

Adonay has worked with livestock, agriculture, and planting vegetables for the past 20 years. He learned this work from his parents, who have always done it.  Adonay walks 4 kilometers to get to work, and he works from 6:00AM to 5:00PM every day.

The loan he is requesting is to buy two cows, which will produce milk for him. He will also be able to sell them and get a bit more income, so that he can improve his family's quality of life.

Adonay dreams of increasing his herd of cattle and of giving his children everything they need to go to school and become professionals. That way, they will have better employment opportunities and will be able to build a brick house. The house they live in now is built of clay.

loans.use: to buy two milk cows

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es:
Gloria  nació en la ciudad de Latacunga en la parroquia Eloy Alfaro  de la provincia de Cotoapxi perteneciente a la República del Ecuador, esta zona se caracteriza por sus habitantes que se dedican a la producción de bloques para la construcción de viviendas,  Gloria tiene 35 años de edad, actualmente se encuentra soltera  y tiene un hijo ya joven, viven en casa de los padres  desde hace ya algunos  años.
Ha sido para ella muy satisfactorio   el poder ayudar a su  hijo y su familia   en todos los gastos de la casa y ser un gran apoyo en las actividades del hogar como en el negocio, aprendió desde muy chica esta actividad y desde ahí se dedica a la venta de chochos con cueros reventados  pues a pesar de todas las necesidades ha salido adelante y ha podido ser madre y padre para su hijo, quien la admira y la respeta mucho. 
Con el esfuerzo de sus padres pudo terminar la primaria y la secundaria , por la difícil situación económica  de su familia tuvo que trabajar desde muy pequeña  y así poder ser un gran apoyo para ella y su familia.
Aprendió de esta actividad  de su hermana quien también se dedica  al mismo negocio trabaja de 6 a 8 horas diarias y sus ventas las realiza en las diferentes ferias de la ciudad.
Por el momento solicita un crédito  para poder  construir una chanchera ya que desea tener ingresos adicionales la misma que servirá para obtener mas rentabilidad.
Gloria y su hijo quieren extender un sincero agradecimiento y felicitación a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Gloria was born in Latacunga City, Eloy Alfaro Parrish, Cotoapxi Province in the Republic of Ecuador. The area is known for its people, who earn their livings making the blocks used for building homes. Gloria is 35-years old. She is currently single and has one son, who is still young. They have lived in her parents' home for a number of years.

Being able to help her son and her family with the household expenses, the housework and the business has been very satisfying for Gloria. She learned the business at a young age, and from there has earned her living selling "chochos con cueros reventados" (a dish similar to beans and cracklings). In spite of all her needs, she has been able to get ahead and be both mother and father to her son. Her son admires and respects her a lot.

Thanks to her parents hard work, Gloria was able to finish primary and secondary school. Due to her family's difficult financial situation, Gloria needed to start working at a young age. She has been a great help to herself and her family.

Gloria learned the business from her sister, who is in the same line of work. Gloria works six to eight hours a day making her sales at the different markets in the city.

For now, Gloria is requesting a loan to be able to build a pigpen. She wants to have an additional income, which will help her to be more profitable.

Gloria and her son want to extend their sincere gratitude and greetings to Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making it possible for Gloria to grow in her business as well as her personal life.

loans.use: to build a pigpen and have an additional income.

loans.name: Jacqueline Estefania

texts.es:
Jacqueline es una joven de 24 años, sin hijos, actualmente vive con su madre en una casa arrendada en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los  Colorados, ciudad caracterizada por ser el puente terrestre que une a las regiones del país. 
Jacqueline es una chica muy alegre y carismática, ahora está cursando el sexto semestre en la universidad en la carrera de Hotelería y Turismo, estudia a partir de las seis de la tarde hasta horas de la noche; ella aun así está muy feliz porque le encanta esta carrera. Jacqueline a sus compañeros y a clientela fija le ofrece los productos que vende, distribuye relojes y cosméticos, comenta que le ha ido muy bien y que gracias a estos ingresos ella ha podido salir adelante.
Ahora solicitó un crédito, comenta nunca haber trabajado con instituciones financieras;  el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería para ir creciendo en el negocio, porque en un futuro tiene planificado ponerse un local , Jacqueline está muy feliz, ya que podrá darse a conocer en el sistema financiero y podrá crecer en su negocio .
texts.en:
Jacqueline is a young woman, age 24. She has no children, and she lives with her mother in a rented house in the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados.  It is a city known for being the land bridge that unites the regions of the country. 

Jacqueline is a happy and charismatic young woman.  She is in her sixth semester at the university, studying for a degree in Hotel Management and Tourism.  She studies from six in the evening until all hours of the night, but even so, she is very happy because she loves this field.

Jacqueline sells products to her friends and regular customers. She distributes watches and cosmetics, and she says that it has gone very well for her, and that thanks to her earnings she has been able to succed.

Now she is requesting a loan, and she comments that she has never worked with a financial institution before.  She will invest the loan in the purchase of more merchandise, in order to keep growing her business, because she has planned to set up a shop in the future.  Jacqueline is very happy, as she will be able to establish a profile in the financial system, and grow in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise in order to keep growing her business.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es:
Mariana es una mujer ecuatoriana de 43 años de edad, vive en la parroquia Pastoalle   en un barrio rural del sector perteneciente a  la Provincia de Cotopaxi, está separada del esposo desde hace varios años, tiene cuatro hijas,  gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres logró terminar la primaria, luego dejo de estudiar porque tuvo un nuevo reto en la vida y ese era el de cuidar a su hija, es de esta manera que ella empezó a trabajar desde muy chica para poder sustentar sus necesidades.
Para Mariana  no fue  nada fácil alejarse de sus  padres ya que era la consentida del hogar, sufrió mucho pero sin embargo ella lucho para ser una buena madre y esposa y así poder darles lo mejor a sus hijos y no se dejó vencer por el dolor que sentía ella ahora es muy feliz porque Dios y la vida le dio la oportunidad de ver crecer a su hijas.
Actualmente Mariana y sus hijas  viven en casa propia   y se dedica a la venta de golosinas, crianza de animales y alquiler  de canchas de vóley desde hace varios años, a pesar de tener un trabajo que le demanda mucho tiempo y esfuerzo, ella dedica  mucho tiempo también a los cuidados de sus hijos.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, y hoy  solicita un crédito que lo utilizará en la compra de cerámicas y activos fijos para mejorar su local,  esto ayudará a  mejorar sus estilo de vida y la de su familia, dándoles la educación que se merecen.
Mariana agradece a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Mariana is an Ecuadorean woman who is 43 years old and lives in Pastoalle parish.  This is a rural area of Cotopaxi province.  Mariana has been separated from her husband for a number of years.  She has four daughters.  Thanks to the efforts of her parents, she was able to finish elementary school, but later she left school because she had a new challenge in life: to care for her daughter.  This is why she started working from a young age to support herself.

For Mariana it was not easy to leave her parents because she was the darling of the household.  She suffered a lot, but nonetheless she fought to be a good mother and wife, and to give the best to her children, and she refused to be defeated by the pain that she felt.  Now she is very happy because God and life have given her the opportunity to see her daughters grow up.

Now Mariana and her daughters live in their own home, and she has been working selling snacks, raising animals, and renting volleyball courts for a number of years.  In spite of her work that takes up a lot of her time and effort, she also spends a lot of time taking care of her daughters.

Mariana is a very hardworking and enterprising woman.  Today, she is requesting a loan to buy ceramics and fixed assets to improve her shop.  This will help her to improve her standard of living and that of her family, and will enable her to give her daughters the education they deserve.

Mariana is grateful to Fundacion Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making it possible for her to grow in her work and personal life.

loans.use: to buy ceramics and fixed assets to improve her shop

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
The borrower is married, lives with his family. He is currently employed in a mechanic shop. He is a hardworking and responsible father.
He has been using glasses for a very long time and now it has become uncomfortable because he cannot perform his job duties. He developed a hereditary cornea problem that affects him to focus on near and far side objects which is really bothering him because he's having frequent headaches and pain in the eyes, the only option for him is to have surgery but due to the high cost he couldn't have the surgery done in the past. He is using this loan to pay the eye surgery. He is in the picture having an eye exam.

loans.use: To have an eye surgery

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano vive en una comunidad de Sololá, él tiene 50 años de edad, tienen una hermosa familia de 8 hijos cuatro hombres y cuatro mujeres, de las edades de entre 12 y 24 años, vive feliz mente con su familia en una comunidad de Sololá.
Mariano es un hombre que le gusta convivir con la naturaleza porque  desde hace 20 años se dedica al cultivo de una diversidad de verduras, según cuenta Mariano que el también realiza otra actividad, pues él trabaja como conserje en una escuela de su comunidad, él lo hace con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos  y mantener a su familia. Mariano en este momento ha empezado a preparar la tierra para cultivar pero lamentable él no cuenta con el capital suficiente para empezar a cultivar para esta temporada, entonces Mariano ha tomado la decisión de realizar un prestamo para comprar sus semillas fertilizantes y otros insumos que el cultivo requiera.
El sueño de Mariano es que con este  prestamo él logre sacar buenas cosechas y buenas ganancias y así poder ayudar a sus hijos para que todos se puedan graduar de la escuela.
texts.en:
Mariano lives in a community in Sololá, he is 50 years old, he has a beautiful family with 8 children, four boys and four girls between ages 12 and 24 years old, he lives happily with his family in a community in Sololá. 

Mariano is a man who likes to coexist with nature because for the last 20 years he has made a living growing a diversity of vegetables, according to Mariano's story he also does other activities, since he works as a janitor in a school in his community, he does it with the goal of improving his income and maintaining his family. At this moment Mariano has begun to prepare the ground to grow but sadly he doesn't have sufficient capital to begin to grow in this season, so Mariano has made the decision to get a loan to purchase his seeds, fertilizers, and other consumables that the crop requires.

Mariano's dream is that with this loan he would manage to get good harvests and good profits and in this way be able to help his children so they can all graduate from school.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Silvia Lissette

texts.es:
Silvia, de 23 años de edad, es estudiante de la carrera Licenciatura en Ciencias Jurídicas, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en el mercado, como empleado en un local de productos varios, tiene un hijo de 2 años de edad.

Silvia, actualmente tiene una venta de verduras, alborotos y sancochos desde hace 3 años.- Antes solo se dedicaba a estudiar; trabaja en el puesto de 8:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m. 

El prestamo lo utilizará para comprar más mercadería para el negocio, ya que necesita ampliarlo más para obtener mejores ganancias, ya que la familia esta creciendo y necesitan mas ingresos. 

Ella sueña con terminar de construir su vivienda y graduarse como abogada.
texts.en:
Silvia is 23 years old and is studying for a degree in Legal Science. She has a partner who works in the market, employed by a shop that sells a variety of products. She has a two year old son.

For three years she has had a small shop selling vegetables, popcorn and stews. Previous to this she studied full time. She works in the stall from 8am until 5pm.

Silvia will use the loan to buy more goods for the business, as she needs to expand more to obtain better profits, as the family is growing and needs more income.

She dreams of finishing the construction of her house and graduating as a lawyer.

loans.use: to buy more goods for her business.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.en: María Teresa is an entrepreneur at 47 years old. She own a business that offers products which help to stylize the figure. Her dream is to improve people's lives by raising their self-esteem using her products. María Teresa aims to increase her sales so she can grow her business and open new stores. She is a very responsible and enthusiastic woman, eager to improve her family’s living conditions. She is asking for the loan to buy corsets in bulk at a discount. This is Maria Teresa’s first loan with Konfio with which she will increase her profitability to cover her payments.

loans.use: to buy corsets in bulk for her store.

loans.name: Kalautia

texts.en:
Kalautia is 32 years old with 5 children. 

She owns and operates a small business cooking and selling BBQ in her community to earn a living. 

Kalautia has requested a loan to buy a box of chicken, box of sausage, mushroom soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas, sack of rice to help her run the business. 

Kalautia hopes to build a small restaurant in the near future using her business profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a box of chicken, box of sausage, mushroom soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas, sack of rice

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en: Josefina is 44 years old, married, and lives with her husband and 4 sons. For two years, in addition of her job as a housekeeper, she has run a business selling lingerie. Josefina's plans for her business is to begin selling shoes. The biggest challenge Josefina is facing at the moment is the low season. In her free time she likes to read and sell products from catalogues. Her dream is to own a well stablished business and to grow professionally to improve her family's quality of life. Every day she wakes up with a positive attitude and she is very optimistic in order to succeed. She is asking a loan to buy the products her clients ask for, such as pajamas, corsets, dressing gowns and underwear. With this loan, she will increase her profit to reinvest in her business and make successful repayments.

loans.use: to buy women's underwear in bulk and expand her product base.

loans.name: Rosa Cecilia

texts.es:
EL sitio Pueblo Nuevo de la ciudad de Portoviejo, cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Grupo De  Crédito Everest. Este es un lugar lleno de vegetación y paisajes hermosos, donde la gente en su mayoría se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, actividad con la cual salen adelante.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 51 años de edad, está separada hace años atrás pero de esta relación tiene  6 hijos mayores de edad, ella vive en casa de una de sus hijos.
Doña Rosa es una mujer muy trabajadora que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder salir adelante hace 3 años atrás empezó un negocio de venta de encebollados y  pan de almidón, ella tiene un local en casa de su hija con la cual trabajan en sociedad, allí trabajan los fines de semana  preparando estos deliciosos platos que son el deleite de sus clientes que siempre llegan hasta su local, ella también de lunes a viernes trabaja realizando labores domesticas en una casa en la localidad.
Este crédito es para comprar pescado,  yuca, sodas y otros víveres más para preparar los alimentos. Lleva tres años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella sale adelante.  Sus sueños son tener buena salud y seguir adelante.
texts.en:
At the site of Pueblo Nuevo in the city of Portoviejo, every fifteen days the members of the Grupo De Crédito Everest meet. This is a place full of vegetation and beautiful landscapes, where the majority of people make a living in farming and ranching, activities with which they get by.

In this place lives señora Rosa, she is 51 years old, she has been separated for a few years but from this relationship she has 6 adult children, she lives in a house with one of her children.

Doña Rosa is a very hardworking woman, who, in order to obtain her own resources and with this be able to get by, started a business 3 years ago selling encebollados (fish stew) and pan de almidón (yuca bread), she has a shop inher daughter's house with which she works in the community, she works there on the weekends preparing those delicious dishes that are the delight of her clients who always come to her shop, she also works Monday through Friday doing domestic labors in a house in the community. 

This loan is to purchase fish, yuca, sodas, and other provisions to prepare the food. She has been Grupo De Crédito for three years and she likes it because with the loans she gets by. Her dreams are to have good health and continue forward.

loans.use: to purchase fish, yuca, sodas, and other provisions.

loans.name: Tofu

texts.en:
Tofu is 33 years old with 2 children. 

She operates a business of selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Tofu has requested a loan to buy bananas, tubers, taro roots, wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, and chemicals to assist her in running the business. 

She joined SPBD in 2014, and hopes to use her business profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bananas, tubers, taro roots, wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, and chemicals

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.en: María Dolores is 49 years old and lives with her relatives. Her main source of income comes from selling cosmetics by catalogue to her friends and acquaintances. In addition to her main business, María prepares cakes and jellies at home to sell to her friends and family. She also would like to have a cake shop in the future. María strives each day to get ahead and expand her customer base in order to sell more and generate a higher income to support her family. She is requesting a loan of MXN 10,000 to buy the products that her customers ask for such as makeup, lipsticks, eyeliners and to maintain healthy financials despite some customers paying late. She considers herself very responsible managing credits and is confident in making successful repayments on her first loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to finance her cosmetics sales by catalogue.

loans.name: Sandra Lizet

texts.en: Sandra is 34 years, married and mother of a three years old girl. She runs a grocery store and is soon to become a mother. Sandra has a dream to grow her business and become a businesswoman to provide for her family. As a persistent woman, she enjoys challenges and she would like to learn another language in order to continue growing professionally. Sandra is requesting a loan to invest in produce such as seasonal fruits and vegetables to buy in bulk and resell in her store. The increase in sales will allow her to reinvest in her store to increase capacity and to make successful repayments on her third loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Clara Elizabeth

texts.en: Clara Elizabeth is 40 years old and a mother of 4 boys who are her driving force every day. Currently she is running a convenience store in order to generate income for her family. She strives for a hard-working ethic to give a good example to her children so they can one day become independent and successful. Her dream is to expand her business into a supermarket. Since her business is quite new, she needs a loan of MXN 10,000 to stock the store and to pay her providers so they can offer a refrigerator and displays. Clara thrives on challenges and once she sets a goal for herself, she persists until she achieves it. The increase in profits generated by this loan will allow her to grow her business, increase the quality of life of her children, and make successful repayments on her first loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to stock her convenience store in bulk and to provide payment to her providers.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en: Maribel is 33 years old, is married and has two children. From a young age, she has liked helping her mother and grandmother to cook. Following her passion for preparing mole, a traditional Mexican dish, Maribel began a business two years ago selling prepared mole to friends, food stores, and occasionally caters for events. She is requesting a loan to buy materials for the food preparation such as condiments, bread, chillies and peanuts, and also for packaging and labels. Maribel is a very persistent woman, she doesn’t give up and always tries to get ahead, so she has been very successful in selling and generating income for her family. Additionally, she would like to run a beauty salon in the future. Whenever preparing mole at home, chillies give off a strong smell and often her family must go outdoors, so her plan in the near future is to move the business to a more formal setting. The additional income from financing a larger production will allow her to invest in a location for her cooking and to make successful repayments to her third loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to buy condiments, bread, chillies and peanuts.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en: Beatriz is 25 years old and lives with her boyfriend as an unmarried couple. Her plan is to save their earning in order to start a family in a near future. Beatriz owns a business, selling computer accessories, which she began three years ago. Her dream is to expand her business into a more established store and gain financial stability for her family. She is asking a loan to increase her stock and include new products in her catalogue. Her increase in sales will allow her to grow her business and make successful repayments in her first loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to buy products for her computer accessories store.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.en: Sandra is 46 years old, a mother of 3 sons and she currently lives with her husband and children. To generate income for her family and provide quality of life, she sells cosmetics and beauty products. Sandra's aspiration is to be able to care for her family. She began a business to distribute these products. Her dream is to gain everyone in the region where she lives as a client. She is asking for a loan to stock the business and expand the catalogue. The increase in income as a result of using this loan will allow her to increase her client base and in the long run have a more stable business as well as help her to make successful repayments.

loans.use: to buy creams and face lotions in bulk to resell.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en: Luisa is 32 years old, is married and lives with her family. Currently, she has a business that sells personal beauty products such as perfumes, creams, lipstick, makeup, eye shadows, eyeliners, nail polishes and other items from her home. She is a very enthusiastic entrepreneur, striving each day to improve her family’s quality of life. She also works with her husband in a business he began, installing security cameras. She knows how to organize her day so she can have time to sell, exercise, watch movies and read. The most important part of her day is knowing her clients are satisfied and happy with her products. She is requesting a loan of MXN 10,000 so she can buy products in bulk to resell. She dreams of expanding her business in order to be an established store and gain financial stability. This loan will allow her to increase her client base and sales in order to make successful payments on her first loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to buy beauty products in bulk to resell from her home.

loans.name: Bertha Alicia

texts.en: Bertha is 44 years old and married. She runs a stationery store, which also offers gifts and party supplies, and has been for over 10 years. As a part of her future plans, she would like to begin another business as a distributor of disposable products. She decided to stationary store because Bertha always is looking to get ahead and generate higher income to have a better quality of life for herself and her family. Every time a new costumer comes to her business, Bertha sees not only a client, but also a friend. She is known for being very sociable and maintains a good relationship with her most frequent customers. Bertha is requesting a loan of MXN 10,000 to buy stock in bulk for sale, such as pens, notebooks, pencils and furniture for the business. This is her first loan with Konfío but is confident in her business to make successful repayments.

loans.use: to buy pens, notebooks, pencils and cards in bulk to resell.

loans.name: Lizveth

texts.en: Lizveth is 31 years old and a mother of two sons that are the greatest treasures she can have. Her aim as a mother is to provide her children with the best she can offer and for this reason, she has owned a clothing store in a market for four years. Her next goal is to run a beauty salon in addition to her store. The biggest challenge she faces in her business is the competition. She aims to be a leader in the clothing industry in her region. Lizveth's business is famous because of the unique experience she offers to her customers, the quality of the clothes and the prices she offers. She is requesting a loan to increase her stock with the new season's clothes and increase her sales. This loan will allow her to become more profitable and be able to provide her children with a better quality of life as well as make successful repayments for her first loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk for the upcoming season.

loans.name: Faaolataga

texts.en: Faaolataga is 41 years old with five children. She owns and operates a small business cooking and selling barbecue in her community to earn a living. She has requested a loan to buy chicken, sausage, mushrooms, soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas, and rice to help her run the business. Faaolataga hopes to build a small restaurant in the near future using her business profit. She became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy chicken, sausage, mushrooms, soy sauce, onions, plates, aluminum foil, bananas, and rice

loans.name: Señor De La Esperanza De Huaripache Group

texts.es: Yajaira tiene 22 años de edad es soltera con 01 hijos dependiente. Ella implemento su librería en su vivienda en el cual la va bien y ahora a través de una antena abastece internet a algunos hogares de su zona. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de útiles escolares cuadernos lapiceros lápices colores y papelería en general. Ella es socia del grupo “SEÑOR DE LA ESPERANZA DE HUARIPACHE”. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Yajaira es la primera persona parada del lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
Yajaira is 22 years old and the single mother of a son. She has set up a store in her home, and business is going well. Yajaira has installed an antenna that provides internet service to several homes in her neighborhood. 

Yajaira will use the loan funds to purchase school supplies, such as notebooks, colored pencils, and a variety of paper products. She is a member of the "Señor de la Esperanza de Huaripache" communal bank. The group members are grateful to Kiva lenders for the loan they're providing. Yajaira is sitting in the chair on the left.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies.

loans.name: Fabio Nelson

texts.es:
Con mucho empuje y perseverancia, Fabio desea iniciar un negocio de cría y levante de ganado en su casa ubicada en el municipio de Tierra Alta.

Esta idea surge a partir de la necesidad de generar unos buenos ingresos para colaborar con el sostenimiento del hogar en que vive con sus padres.

Se caracteriza por ser un joven alegre y muy colaborador, cualidades que han hecho que se gane el cariño y respeto de la gente de la vereda.
Con este préstamo podrá dar inicio a este negocio.

El dinero será invertido en la compra de un caballo para realizar el pastoreo de sus animales de una mejor manera.
texts.en:
With lots of drive and perseverance, Fabio has decided to open a business of breeding and raising cattle in his home, located in the municipality of Tierra Alta.

This idea stems from the need to generate a good income in order to contribute to the sustainability of the home in which he lives with his parents.

He is known for being a happy and very collaborative youth, qualities which have won him affection and respect from the people of the village. 

With this loan he will be able to start his business. The money will be used to buy a horse to improve the grazing of his animals.

loans.use: to buy a horse for herding.

loans.name: Al- Acram Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al- Acram. It consists of four women who lives in Sana'a city, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB.

Aida is a 31-year-old single woman who lives with her family in an old house. Her father was the sole breadwinner. Unfortunately, he passed away several years ago. He was an employee in a public sector with a small salary. Now, his children receive a half of that salary which is not enough to cover the necessary expenses of the family. 

Aida is the leader of the group who strives strongly to make the necessary renovation for her old house. She doesn't have the money that enables her to do that. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase paint for the house to renovate it from the inside.

Adia's dream is to see her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase paint for the house to renovate it from the inside

loans.name: Kirubukene Group

texts.fr:
Déo fait partie du groupe kirubukene et  habite à Gitega. Il  a 35 ans et est marié à Jacqueline, une  cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés de 2  à 14 ans  dont 3 étudient.

Il fait le commerce de  boutique (haricot, riz,…) depuis 10 ans. 

Il est à son quatrième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de riz et de haricot  à revendre pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Déo, age 35, is a member of the Kirubukene group and he lives in Gitega. He is married to a farmer named Jacqueline; they have five children ages 2 to 14, three of whom go to school.

Déo has been a shopkeeper for 10 years selling beans, rice, etc. 

This is his 4th loan cycle with Turame. He plans to use the funds to bolster his capital and purchase a large quantity of beans and rice to sell and increase his income.

loans.use: to bolster his capital and purchase a large quantity of beans and rice to sell and increase his income.

loans.name: Lovine

texts.en: Lovine is a 62-year-old widow with seven children. She has a small vegetable garden where she grows cabbages and tomatoes that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for one year and has been a member of SPBD since 2015. Lovine needs a loan to buy chicken manure, fertilizer, seeds, chemicals, a shovel and a pitchfork. Lovine will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy chicken manure, fertilizer, seeds, chemicals, a shovel and a pitchfork.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es: Aydee de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de ropa de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de su ventas logra sacar adelante a sus hijos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Aydee, age 40, is a single mother.  She lives in her own house with her two children.  She has been selling clothes in an itinerant manner at the different markets that are close to her house for several years.  With what she gets from her sales she manages to get her children ahead.

She is requesting a loan to buy more clothes wholesale in order to continue with her sales and, in this way, to have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy more clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia is 52 years old and is divorced with 6 children. She makes and sells elei printed material to earn a living, and she has been doing this for 7 years. 

Sofia has requested a loan to buy a cutter, table, new gloves, stencils, brushes, rollers, wooden carved designs, and material. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. 

Sofia joined South Pacific Business Development in 2008 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a cutter, table, new gloves, stencils, brushes, rollers, wooden carved designs, and material.

loans.name: Nasareta

texts.en: Nasareta is 32 years old with five children. She runs a small business and provides services to people by cutting grass to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. Nasareta has requested a loan to buy a lawn mowing machine, chemicals, safety boots and celluloid to help her with the business. She will use her profits to expand her business and provide good services. Nasareta became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a lawn mowing machine, chemicals, safety boots and celluloid.

loans.name: María Andrea

texts.es:
María Andrea tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y un hijo en la comunidad de Oyotún, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, gallinas, pollos, desde hace varios años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismos y para la compra de una mayor cantidad de pollos, patos y gallinas, de esta manera ella espera ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de animales, con esto María Andrea espera incrementar el stock de su negocio lo que le va a permitir aumentar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Andrea, 40, lives with her husband and son in the community of Oyotún. The people there make a living in agriculture, commerce, and livestock farming. It is situated in the province of Chiclayo which is part of the Lambayque region along the north coast of Peru.

María Andrea makes a living raising and selling animals such as ducks, roosters, and hens. She's been in business for many years, working out of her backyard. She has asked for this loan in order to buy balanced animal feed to fatten her animals and to buy a larger quantity of chickens and ducks. In doing such, she hopes to offer her customers a better variety of animals. 

María Andrea hopes to increase the stock of her business which will permit her to increase her income and eventually improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed to fatten her animals, and to purchase a greater number of chickens and ducks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase some of the necessary spare parts needed to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Al- Tawhed Group

texts.en:
Al- Tawhed is a support group made up of four women who are active and dynamic. They came to Al- Amal Bank and asked for a loan of 200,000 YER.
This group is coordinated by Nesain, who is 27 years old, single, and works as a physician assistant in the private sector. In truth, the salary which she receives from this business is very small because she is employed with only a secondary school education. The house where she lives with her family lacks a lot of home appliances. Nesain's father works hard to improve their poor living conditions but his income is limited. As a result, Nesain decided to help him and applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to purchase a refrigerator for the house. 
Nesain hopes to get a high salary that will help her provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator for the house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase stylish ready-made women's clothes to resale door to door.

loans.name: Omecca

texts.en: Omecca is 27 years old with six children. She owns and operates a small business selling ice cake in her village to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. Omecca has requested a loan to buy ice, sugar, a Coolio, plastic bags, and containers to help her run the business. She hopes to use her profits to expand her business and provide for her family's needs. Omecca joined SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy ice, sugar, a Coolio, plastic bags, and containers

loans.name: Talosaga

texts.en: Talosaga is a 33-year-old divorced woman with no children. She makes and sells barbeque in her community to earn a living. She has one year of experience with this business. Talosaga needs a loan to buy mutton flaps, sausages, chicken leg quarters, soya sauce, onions and paper plates. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Talosaga has been a member of SPBD since 2015.

loans.use: to buy mutton flaps, sausages, chicken leg quarters, soya sauce, onions and paper plates.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is the 27-year-old mother of three children. She runs a small business of selling plastic flowers, carvings and cava bowls at the market to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. Grace has requested a loan to buy plastic flowers, woods for carving, paint brushes and paint color to help her run the business. Grace hopes to use her profits to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy plastic flowers, woods for carving, paint brushes and paint color.

loans.name: Aitasi

texts.en: Aitasi is a 40-year-old mother with two children. She runs a small business selling fish in her community to earn a living. Aitasi has requested a loan to buy a fishing net, fishing gear, ice, canoe, and a container to help her run the business. She will use her profits to expand her business and provide for her family's needs. Aitasi joined SPBD in 2011.

loans.use: to buy a fishing net, fishing gear, ice, canoe, and a container

loans.name: Flo

texts.en:
Flo is a 38-year-old woman with six children. She owns and operates a small business of selling elei printing materials at the market to earn a living.

Flo has requested loan to buy rolling materials, paint colors, paint brushes, elei designs, containers, and a printing machine to assist her in running the business.

She has been doing this for more than two years. Flo hopes to build a small elei shop in her village in the near future. She became a member of SPBD in 2013.

loans.use: to buy rolling materials, paint colors, paint brushes, elei designs, containers, and a printing machine.

loans.name: Faaletatau

texts.en:
Faaletatau is 22 years old. He owns and operates a small business of bingo in his community to earn a living. He has been doing this for more than a year.

Faaletatau has requested a loan to buy a bingo machine, a box of paper bingo, and a box of ink bottles to assist him in running the business.

He hopes to use his profit to expand the business. Faaletatau became a member of SPBD in 2015.

loans.use: to buy a bingo machine, a box of paper bingo, and a box of ink bottles.

loans.name: Hana

texts.en:
Hana is 18 years old and single with no children. She makes and sells elei printed material to earn a living and has been doing this for one year.

Hana has requested a loan to buy a cutter, material, stencils, a brush, wooden carved designs, rollers, and gloves. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family’s weekly expenses.

She joined SPBD in 2015 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a cutter, material, stencils, a brush, wooden carved designs, rollers, and gloves.

loans.name: Bibilhol

texts.ru: Бибихолу 28 лет. Она проживает на районе Бохтар вместе с родителями. Она милая, заботливая и домашняя девушка. Бибихол любит своих родителей и старается им помочь во всем, так же по обеспечению семьи. Она в течение 8 лет занимается животноводческой деятельностью. Бибихол любит проводить время на скотном дворе. Не смотря на то что это тяжелая работа для девушки, Бибихол справляется на ура. Ее животные всегда накормленные и напоенные. Бибихолу сейчас необходимо поддержать бизнес и купить еще пару голов скотов. Но для совершения данной покупки ей не хватает не большой суммы денег. По этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Она надеется, что ее в этот момент поддержат.
texts.en: Bibilhol is 28 years old.  She lives in the Bohtar district with her parents.  She is a kind, caring and quiet young woman.  She loves her parents and tries to help them with everything, in particular by providing for the family.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for the past eight years.  She loves to spend time with her livestock.  In spite of the fact that this is no easy job for a young woman, Bibilhol does an excellent job.  Her animals are always well fed and have plenty to drink.  Bibilhol wants to boost her activity and intends to buy two additional head of cattle.  However, in order to make this purchase, she needs a small amount of money, which is the reason why she is taking a loan.  She is currently relying on your support.

loans.use: to increase her number of farm animals and to keep her business.

loans.name: Daldo Jesus

texts.es:
Daldo, de 36 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de comidas cerca a su casa ubicada en el municipio de Sincelejo, en este negocio vende pasteles de pollo, empanadas, buñuelos, entre otros.
Daldo trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde, es un hombre muy responsable, juicioso y aplicado con su negocio.
Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como el costo de los insumos, la competencia en el sector y las fuertes lluvias que azotan su puesto de trabajo.
El pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar insumos como pollo, aceite, harina, entre otros.
El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño y tendrá una mayor variedad de alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio dependen sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Daldo, age 36, has decided to set up a food business close to his house, which is in the Sincelejo municipality.  In this business he sells ‘pasteles de pollo’ [puff pastry with chicken filling], empanadas, and ‘buñuelos’ [fried dough balls], among other things.

Daldo works every day from six in the morning until one in the afternoon.  He is a very responsible and sensible man who exerts himself for his business.

One of his unrealized dreams is to be able to have a restaurant in which he would offer different types of food, and he would be able to offer employment.  He faces multiple difficulties like the cost of the supplies, the competition in the areas, and the heavy rains that ravage the stand where he works.

He is requesting financial support to capitalize his business and to buy supplies like chicken, cooking oil, and flour, among other items.

The loan will have a favorable impact on his life and his business.  He will be able to fulfill his dream, and he will have a greater variety of food to offer his customers.  Also, his two children are dependent upon this business.

loans.use: to buy supplies like chicken, cooking oil, and flour, among other items.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: Jose de 35 años de edad viven casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su pick up desde hace 4 años, tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is 35 years old. He lives in his own house with his life partner. He has been dedicated to offering travel in his pick-up truck for 4 years. He has many clients that prefer him because of the responsibility he shows toward the time they need to be driven. With what he earns from his work, he succeeds in paying for his household expenses. 

He is requesting a loan to buy tires and to maintain his vehicle, since it is his only source of work. This will allow him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tires and to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
Gracias a la perseverancia y coraje de Maria es que su hogar puede tener una vida digna.
Ella prepara y vende comidas rápidas en el municipio de Medellín, actividad que emprendió con el afán de buscar nuevos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia.
Su esposo e hijos son la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar diariamente y esforzarse para ser cada día mejor.
Trabaja con 2 empleados durante 6 horas todos los días.
Ella espera poder impulsar su negocio con la compra insumos y materia prima, este impulso se lo pueden dar la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.
Con estos elementos ella podrá tener sus alimentos disponibles para sus clientes en todo momento.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener un restaurante en la misma zona para no perder a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Thanks to Maria’s perseverance and courage, her household has a dignified life.

She prepares and sells fast food in the municipality of Medellín. This is an activity that she learned with the desire to find a new source of income for the sustenance of her family.

Her husband and children are her biggest motivation to work everyday and to make an effort to have every day be better than the last. She works with 2 employees for 6 hours everyday. 

She hopes to be able to drive her business by buying supplies and raw materials. She offers this drive to the Interactuar Corporation and to the Kiva lenders.

With these elements, she will be able to have her food available for her clients all the time.

Her biggest dream is to be able to have a restaurant in the same area, so that she doesn’t lose any clients.

loans.use: to buy supplies and raw materials for her food.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 27-year-old married father of 2 children. The oldest child is 5 years old and the youngest is 3 years old, and they all live together in Sana'a city, Yemen. 

Ali has a university education. However, due to high rates of unemployment in the country, Ali is one of many young men who studied at university but nonetheless was not able to find a job sufficient for supporting his family. But he didn't give in to his miserable conditions and instead decided to purchase a taxi to drive in order to earn enough to provide for his children. 

This humble business is the main source of income for Ali and his family. He works very hard from Sunday to Sunday, 15 hours a day. As a result of so much use, his taxi broke down and now needs both a necessary repair and maintenance. 

However, Ali's income is not sufficient to cover the cost. For this reason, he applied for a 65,000 YER loan from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank in order to purchase the spare parts to make the necessary repair for his taxi.

Ali hopes to purchase another new taxi to drive.

loans.use: to purchase some spare parts to make a necessary repair for his taxi.

loans.name: Sidwata 04 Sapone Group

texts.fr:
Mr SALAM représente le groupe SIDWATA 04 SAPONE. Marié, il est père de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 15ans et le moins âgé a 05ans. 03 vont à l’école. Il a 11personnes en charge.
Mr fait l’agriculture depuis 09ans. Il s’approvisionne en ville à OUAGA.
Il veut s’acheter 06rouleaux de grillage.
Mr veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour agrandir son champ d’activité. Il ambitionne assurer la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
Salam represents the Sidwata 04 Sapone Group. He is married and a father of 4 children. The oldest is 15 years old and the youngest is 5 years old. 3 of them go to school. He is responsible for 11 people. 
Salam has been farming for 9 years. He stocks up in town at Ouaga.
He would like to buy 6 rolls of wired fence. 
He would like to use his earnings to enlarge his field of work. 
He hopes to ensure schooling for his children.

loans.use: to buy 6 rolls of wired fence

loans.name: Amer

texts.en:
Amer is a 26-year-old, single man, living in Jarash. He is studying to get his bachelor's degree in communication engineering and he is now in his fourth year. He should graduate within four years, but the financial difficulties prevent him from covering his university fees. 

The difficult finances led Amer to apply for an educational loan to help him cover his semester fees.  Amer is planning to work in the same field with good income, so he will help his family with the household expenses.

loans.use: to cover his semester fees.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en: Ana is 36 years old and married with one child. She owns and operates a small store, selling a variety of items. She has been doing this for one year. Ana needs a loan to buy a new display fridge, a chest freezer, snacks, frozen goods, and canned items. She hopes to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She became a member of SPBD in 2015 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy a new display fridge, a chest freezer, snacks, frozen goods, and canned items

loans.name: Fesuluai

texts.en:
Fesuluai is a 49-year-old mother with seven children. To earn a living, she owns and operates a small business that sells pancake, pork cake, and buns in her community. She has been doing this for more than two years.

Fesuluai has requested a loan to buy to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a fry pan, which she needs for running her business. She hopes to use her profit to build a small bakery store in the near future. Fesuluai joined SPBD in 2013.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, plastic bags, a wooden spoon, and a fry pan

loans.name: Faalataina

texts.en: Faalataina is a 43-yea- old unmarried woman with three children. She runs a small canteen in her community to earn a living. She has one year of experience with this business. Faalataina needs a loan to buy pies, donuts, soft drinks, a boiler, pancakes, coffee, and a bag of sugar. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Faalataina has been a member of SPBD since 2015.

loans.use: to buy pies, donuts, soft drinks, a boiler, pancakes, coffee, and a bag of sugar

loans.name: Ani

texts.en: Ani is a 30-year-old woman who is single with one child. She runs a small tailoring business in her community. She has one year of experience with this business. Ani has requested a loan to buy a new sewing machine, thread, needles, a measuring tape, a new pair of scissors, and material. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She joined SPBD in 2015 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, thread, needles, a measuring tape, a new pair of scissors, and material

loans.name: Dy

texts.en:
Dy, 43, resides in Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia. She has four single children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business in her community. She grows rice. She has been in this type of business for almost 30 years.

On average, she is able to make an income of 2 USD per day. Currently, she would like to request a Kiva loan via HKL to buy a motorbike. This loan will allow her to have a personal vehicle so that she can experience a convenient way of travelling. She would like to thank all lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike

loans.name: Merilyn

texts.en:
Merilyn is 47 years old and married. She is from Lopez Jaena, Philippines. Merilyn has a snack vending business and earns approximately 4,000 PHP each month doing this type of business, which she has done for nine years. This is how she has helped her husband in sustaining their needs. 

She wants to provide her family with a simple, yet comfortable living space for all of them. She has requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase nails, additional sticks, and plywood for her house. Merilyn recently became an active member of PMPC. Now she is on her way to repairing her house.

loans.use: to purchase nails, additional sticks, and plywood for her house.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is a businesswoman from Lopez Jaena. She is 31 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari (general) store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. 

Roselyn is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without record of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. 

Roselyn continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam is 43 years old and lives in Gata, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with three children now at their school age. 

Meriam manages her own photocopying, school supplies and sari-sari (general) store business. She’s been engaged in this business for ten years already. At present, she is also an appointed barangay official in replacement of her late husband, who was an elected barangay official. She earns approximately 15,000 PHP each month, an amount that is so helpful to support her family's basic needs. 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional office supplies for her photocopying business and for retail. 

Meriam has been a member of PMPC for almost seven years. In the future, Meriam hopes to expand her photocopying and general store business.

loans.use: to purchase additional office supplies.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, two of whom are still in school, Mary Jane works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling used clothing in the Philippines, and earns additional income from a general store. Mary Jane is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to  purchase more boxes of used clothing for her business.

Mary Jane has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of used clothing for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a taxi.

loans.name: Ma. Evangeline

texts.en:
Ma. Evangeline is 45 years old and married with six children, four of whom are currently in school.

She earns a living raising pigs in the Philippines. Ma. Evangeline is borrowing 24,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional pigs, as well as feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Ma. Evangeline has been in this business for three years and earns additional income from motorcycle transportation.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs, as well as feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional pigs, as well as feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Dede

texts.fr: Agée de 41 ans et mère de quatre enfants, Dede est une femme mariée et demeure à Adamavo. Elle entreprend une activité d’alimentation générale en vendant des tomates et spaghettis dans sa boutique. Elle s’approvisionne deux fois par semaine au grand marché de Lomé. Pour alimenter sa boutique, Dede désire ce prêt pour acheter une quantité considérable de tomates en boite et des spaghettis. Cela afin d’améliorer son niveau de vie familiale.
texts.en: 41 years old and a mother of four children, Dede is a married woman and lives in Adamavo. She is taking up a business in general food supply by selling tomatoes and spaghetti at her store. She stocks up twice a week at the large market in Lomé. To supply her store, Dede is requesting this loan to buy a considerable amount of canned tomatoes and boxes of spaghetti. This is in order to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy 20 cans of tomatoes and 10 boxes of spaghetti

loans.name: Elise

texts.fr: Elise est une femme mariée et agée de 30 ans qui vit à Adamavo. Elle est mère de deux enfants qui sont tous scolarisés. Elise est une revendeuse de riz préparé et de pate préparée à l’aide du maïs. Elle s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché d’Akodessewa. Pour acheter des sacs du riz et du mais, Elise demande ce fonds pour rehausser ses ventes journalières et disposer d’un bénéfice considérable pour aider son mari dans l’éducation de leurs enfants.
texts.en: Elise is a 30 year old, married woman who live in Adamavo. She is a mother of two children who both attend school. She resells prepared rice and pasta made from corn. She stocks up four times a month at the Akodessewa market. She is requesting this loan in order to buy bags of rice and corn, which will allow her to increase her daily sales and to have considerable profits to help her husband support their children's education.

loans.use: to buy 1 bag of rice and 1 bag of corn

loans.name: Naimahon

texts.ru: Наимахон 36 лет, замужем, мать 5 детей. У Наимахон - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством, выращивая картофель на 0,27 ГА собственной земли. Продукция пользуется большим спросом, поэтому Наимахон решила обратиться в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 75,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений и семян картофеля, а также на приобретение овец. Наимахон является одним из трех участников группы "Отабек". Доходы от кредита Наимахон планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, и планирует накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Naimahon is 36 years old, married, and the mother of five children.  She has a secondary education and is involved in agriculture, an activity which constitutes her family's main source of income.  She grows potatoes on 0.27 hectare of her own land.  She receives a high demand for her crop production, and this is the reason why she has decided to turn to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC.  She has requested a loan of 75,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizers, potato seeds, and a few sheep.  Naimahon is a member of the "Otabek" group which comprises three members in all.  She plans to use the earnings from her loan to further develop her business, and also to save enough money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds, fertilizers, and a few sheep.

loans.name: Isalei

texts.en: Isalei is 37 years old and married with one child. She makes and sells elei printed material to earn a living and has been doing this for one year. Isalei has requested a loan to buy fabric paint, material, brushes, sponges, a cutter, stencil, and wooden carved designs. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She joined SPBD in 2015 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy fabric paint, material, brushes, sponges, a cutter, stencils, and wooden carved designs

loans.name: Taliilagi

texts.en: Taliilagi is a 26-year-old woman who is single with no children. She runs a small tailoring business in her community. She has one year of experience with this business. Taliilagi has requested a loan to buy rolls of material, a new sewing machine, measuring tape, needles, thread and a pair of scissors. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She joined SPBD in 2015 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy rolls of material, a new sewing machine, measuring tape, needles, thread, and a pair of scissors

loans.name: Marjhon

texts.en:
Marjhon is 18 years old and a freshman student studying Human Kinetics. Despite living in poverty, he is very eager to finish his education. 

His mother raises hogs and is also a daycare worker, while his father is a driver. Marjhon is the fourth child among the five siblings. 

He is now asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to pay tuition fees and allowances at school. He promises to pay back his loan in full, with the help of his supportive parents.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees and allowances at school.

loans.name: Yin

texts.en:
Yin, 64, is a married woman who lives in the small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has six married children. 

To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small piece of farmland located near her house. On her farm, she grows rice and sells her agricultural products to local dealers. On average, she can generate earnings of 5 USD per day.

The current farmland that she owns is small and it provides little benefit to her. She wants to expand her farm area, but she cannot afford to do so. Therefore, she would like to obtain a Kiva loan to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice. 

She hopes this additional farmland will help to improve her living conditions. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice.

loans.name: Annalyn

texts.en:
Annalyn, 34, is a resident of Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. Married to Romeo, her delivery boy, she has four children; one is in high school, one is in the elementary level, and the other two are not of school age yet. She and her husband work to fund their everyday needs and for the schooling of their children.

Annalyn is an LPG retailer. She buys liquefied petroleum gas from a wholesaler and sells it per tank with a little profit. LPG tanks can range from small to regular size tanks. Most Filipino households use this kind of gas for cooking. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Aside from her gas business, she also has rooms for rent for additional income. She earns a minimum of 1,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan, which she will use to buy more stock of LPG tanks to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help, for it will surely help cover their daily sustenance and the education of her children.

Annalyn hopes to maintain and grow her business to be able to save and send her children to school. She dreams to always lead a happy and decent life. She meets up every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for several tanks of liquefied petroleum gas to sell.

loans.name: Ny

texts.en:
Ny, 36, is a married woman from Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has two children, who are currently in school. To make a living, she manages and operates a farming business, grows rice and sells the crops to the local dealers. So far, she has been involved in this type of business for twenty years. She is able to make an income of USD 2.00 per day, on average.

Recently, some parts of her house have deteriorated, and they need to be fixed to provide a suitable living for the household. Due to the lack of funds, she has applied for a Kiva loan via HKL to pay for her house renovation.

She and her family will be thankful to the lenders for helping them with the loan funded to improve their living standards.

loans.use: to pay for her house renovation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional pigs, as well as feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional pigs, as well as feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Sanita

texts.en:
Sanita works hard to support her family. She is married, with seven children, three of whom are still in school.

Sanita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Sanita has been in this business for ten years now, and earns additional income from a food vending business.

She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Laida

texts.en:
Laida works hard to support her family. She is married and has a auto repair service business in the Philippines.

Laida requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy spare parts and materials used for her business.

Laida has been in this business for three years now, and earns additional income from a general store.

She would like to build and expand her business in order to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and materials used for her business.

loans.name: Precil

texts.en:
Precil is a married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Precil is 39 years old.

Precil has a ready to wear sales business in the Philippines. Precil requested a 19,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more ready to wear products for resale, such as pants, shirts, t-shirts, shorts, slippers and handbags.

Precil has been in this business for two years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more ready to wear products for resale, such as pants, shirts, t-shirts, shorts, slippers and handbags.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is 29 years old and married with four children, three of whom are still in school.

Jovelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional merchandise to sell at her store, such as sardines, soft drinks, noodles, spices, detergent, etc.

Jovelyn has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns income from a food vending business.

Jovelyn aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise to sell at her store, such as sardines, soft drinks, noodles, spices, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 40 years old and married with one child.

Geraldine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional goods for resale, like sardines, soft drinks and noodles.

Geraldine has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 14 years and also earns income from motorcycle transportation.

Geraldine aspires to save enough money in order to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods for resale, like sardines, soft drinks and noodles.

loans.name: Ritchel

texts.en:
Ritchel works hard to support herself. She is single and has a recycled materials sales business in the Philippines.

Ritchel requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more recycled materials. Ritchel has been in this business for three years now, and earns additional income from a general store.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure her future.

loans.use: to buy more recycled materials for resale.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
As a single mother of 2 children in school, Jane works hard to support her family.

Jane has a buy-and-sell frozen product business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from selling ready-to-wear clothing. 

Jane is borrowing 19,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy additional frozen products to sell to her customers.

Jane has been sustaining her business activities with her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional frozen products to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
